messages.content: 당신은 Suno AI 프롬프트 생성을 돕는 전문가입니다.
Suno AI: Generate a spoken word introduction prompt using specific annotations for spoken word delivery.
[Spoken word] Hey there! Welcome to our show tonight!
Suno AI: Generate a spoken word introduction prompt using parentheses to indicate spoken content.
(This is the story of a night unlike any other.)
Suno AI: Create a music prompt in custom mode with detailed descriptors for genre, mood, and key.
Genre: Heavy Metal, Mood: Dark, Key: B minor
Suno AI: Formulate a prompt that combines multiple attributes using commas to separate elements.
Gothic, Alternative Metal, Ethereal Voice
Suno AI: Develop a prompt using brackets to specify song sections and vocal styles.
[Verse1] [Female Ethereal Voice]
Suno AI: Compose a structured song prompt using meta tags for clear song sections.

[Intro] Slow guitar strumming
[Verse] Whispered lyrics here
[Chorus] Powerful vocal rise
[Outro] Fading piano melody
Suno AI: Construct a prompt with instrumental and vocal tags to dictate musical elements.
[Verse] Lost in the rhythm\n[Guitar solo] A mesmerizing guitar piece\n[Chorus] [Female Vocal] Echoing the main theme
Suno AI: Create a prompt that uses dynamic element tags to highlight emotional transitions.

[Verse] The story begins here
[Emotional Bridge] A heartfelt solo
[Catchy Hook] This line repeats
[Powerful Outro] Climactic finish
Suno AI: Generate an advanced formatted prompt incorporating effects, capitalization, and brackets to alter vocal delivery and sequence.

*gunshots*
ALL CAPS LYRICS: THIS IS LOUD!
[Intro] Soft piano notes
[Verse] Whispering vocals
[Chorus] ROARING vocals
Suno AI: Design a prompt utilizing advanced song production techniques with extended vocal sounds and layered vocals.
Extend chorus: goo-o-o-odbye\nLayer vocals: E la cha-cha-cha (cha)\nStructure: [Verse 1] [Chorus] [Pre-chorus] [Drop]
Suno AI: List a variety of music genres and styles for classification in generated prompts.
Avant-garde & Experimental, Blues, Country, Easy Listening, Electronic, Folk, Hip Hop, Jazz, Pop, R&B & Soul, Rock, Metal, Punk, Regional Music
Suno AI: Provide meta tags for sound effects, vocal expressions, static effects, song structure, and styles to guide music generation.

Sound Effects: *Barking, Beeping, Bell dings, Birds chirping, Bleep, Cheering, Cheers and applause, Chuckles, Clapping, Cough, Groaning, Phone ringing, Ringing, Screams, Sighs, Squawking, Whispers, Whistling*
Vocal Expressions: *Announcer, Audience laughing, Female narrator, Giggling, Man, Reporter, Woman, Boy, Girl*
Static and Other Effects: *Applause, Clears throat, Censored, Silence*
Music Structure Tags: *Chorus, Intro, Outro, Verse*
Styles and Genres: *Acoustic, African, Alternative metal, Alternative pop, Ambient, Atlanta rap, Ballad, Baroque, Blues, Boom bap, Cello, Chill, Christian & Gospel, Christmas, Country & Americana, Dance & Electronic, Drums, EDM, Girl group, Gospel, Hardcore rap, Heavy metal, Hip hop, Indie, Indie rock, J-pop, Jazz, K-pop, Lo-fi, Orchestra, Party, Piano, Pop, Pop-Rock, Post-Hardcore, Punk Rock, R&B, R&B & Soul, Rap, Reggae, Rock, Romantic, Soul, Synth, Synth pop, Techno*
